name: Name of your store
fotoBG: Upload a background picture. This image is going to appear on your company page
intro.head: Welcome!
intro.text: You have made a great decision to sign up with Covexit. We are pleased to guide you through this process.
googleConfirm.head: Let's talk business!
googleConfirm.text: Next, we want to learn something about your company. Do you want to enter it manually or import it from Google Business? Don't worry, you can still change the data after the import.
searchGoogle.head: Name your business.
searchGoogle.text: Under which name is your company known? Enter your store name.
manually.head: Business information
manually.text: Now we set up your business account! Please fill out the form below.
googleConfirm.continue: Perfect we are finished, you are ready to go!
